page.title: 01Shenstone,our patch.
page.content: General points of Shenstone area; Shenstone is a pretty village about three miles from Lichfield. Shenstone is situated on a hill with the church at the top making the village easily recognizable. The population of Shenstone is, about 3000 people. If more new houses were to be built in Shenstone, the population would go up. Shenstone has one other church a Methodist. Facilities include shops, station, bus service, playing fields with swings and slide and tennis courts .There are five other villages nearby. One of them Lynn, and Shenstone were once owned by the House of Stanly after the battle of Bosworth. The other villages are, Lower Stonnal, Chesterfield, Hilton and Footherley. There are about 12 farms near Shenstone. Jenny Bass.
